casebody.data:
No. 09-10642. Frederick L. Pitchford, Petitioner v. Daniel Madden Turbitt, Administrative Judge, Merit Systems Protection Board. 560 U.S. 974, 130 S. Ct. 3431,

177 L. Ed. 2d 340,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 4862. June 14, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
